Equipment Actions.Action 1: Greataxe, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Spear, Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft or 20/60ft, Average Damage: 12 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Orc makes 2 attacks with its Greataxe or its Spear
Other Actions.Action 2: Battle Cry, Each creature of the War Chief's choice that can hear it gains advantage on attack rolls.  The War Chief then makes one attack as a Bonus Action

Abilities.Ability 1: Aggressive, As a Bonus Action, the Orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see
Abilities.Ability 2: Gruumsh's Fury, The Orc deals an extra 4 Damage when it hits with a weapon attack
